actions.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
The previous question was ordered on the bill and amendment pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Royce.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment requires the Office of Financial Research (OFR) of the Department of the Treasury to publish an annual work plan, develop and implement a cybersecurity plan, and collaborate with relevant regulatory agencies when preparing public reports, which shall also be subject to public notice and comment.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 114-489 to require the Office of Financial Research (OFR) of the Department of the Treasury to publish an annual work plan, develop and implement a cybersecurity plan, and collaborate with relevant regulatory agencies when preparing public reports, which shall also be subject to public notice and comment.
